entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as being taken to hospital by Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as taking Dudley to hospital and having a nasty grin on his face.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as waking up early, getting ready for the train, and checking his Hogwarts list.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is mentioned as being safely shut in her cage by Harry.

entities.name: harry's trunk
entities.description: Harry's trunk is mentioned as being loaded into the Dursleys' car and wheeled into the station.

entities.name: smeltings
entities.description: Smeltings is mentioned as a school that Dudley will be attending after his tail is removed.

entities.name: harry's robes
entities.description: Harry's wizard robes are mentioned as something he doesn't want to wear into the station.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon takes Dudley to hospital.
Harry keeps Hedwig safely in her cage.
